q: Steven Tyler , 62, revealed on" The Late Show with David Letterman " Monday that during the accident- which led to broken bones and the cancellation of Aerosmith's tour- he was high. For whatever reason, the administration never made public these facts about an active WMD production facility run by terrorists in Iraq, Donald Rumsfeld wrote.
